page.title: 09Charing Changed cont'd
page.content: We asked Miss Ruglys about Charing in the future. In her view the new M20 will be a great help for Charing in the future as it will take traffic away from the streets. Also the A20 divides the village and it will make it a less dangerous road. We also asked Miss Ruglys about the School she told us that the school has changed a lot. There have been four extensions. The first two are the J2 and J3 classrooms. They were built in 1955. The second two extensions were built in 1966. They were the J4 classroom and the hall. Then the infant block was built. The kitchens and dining room were also an addition to the school.
